body_html:
Hi,
I resolved the issue by adding "binutils 2.29" to the environment variables PATH and LD_LIBRARY_PATH:
PATH=/share/apps/binutils/binutils-2.29.1/bin/:$PATH
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/share/apps/binutils/binutils-2.29.1/lib/:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH

body:
Hi,
I resolved the issue by adding "binutils 2.29" to the environment variables PATH and LD_LIBRARY_PATH:
PATH=/share/apps/binutils/binutils-2.29.1/bin/:$PATH
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/share/apps/binutils/binutils-2.29.1/lib/:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
